
When the leaves started to fall down

NAME leaf
DLG ITM_0

ITM 1
00000000
00000000
00111100
01000010
01111110
01000010
01111110
00000000
DLG ITM_1

DLG SPR_0
Cat: Miaow

DLG ITM_0
You found a beautiful autumn leaf. It's time to go on an excursion!

DLG SPR_1
Roger: This city really moves me. When I arrived I was 20. I met a girl, we married... Our boy was borned and raised here. Now he is in the big city. I'ts difficult to live in a small town when you are young, I guess. 

DLG SPR_2
Emma: This is my last High School's year. I can't wait to send my uni requests. It's scary... all this changes... but I know that something better it's waiting for me. 

DLG SPR_3
Frank: I used to come here with my child. Be a father it's not easy.

DLG SPR_4
Claire: This is my best place in the world. The nature, the animals, the breeze... Dad and I were always together. He fell ill and he didn't really recovered. Since this, things aren't the same. I feel sad. Sometimes...

DLG SPR_5
Bobbie: I love barbecues. I'm searching for a job since several years. My girlfriend left me some months ago but I still positive. Err... could you pass me that beer, please? New York, this city is amazing. Why are you there so quiet? Who are you? Mom?

DLG SPR_6
Helen: One, two, three, four, one, two, three, four... Love sport! We women are really strong! We need to end stereotypes. I can't believe we are in XXI century. One, two, three, four, one, two, three, four...  

DLG ITM_1
The true treasure are you! 

END 0
Life kept moving when the leaves started to fall down.  

VAR a
42
